inclusion.criterion: Parental report of previous history of asthma or wheezing episode documented by physician at least 3 months prior to enrollment
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Acute Asthma exacerbation as defined by attending physician and asthma score (PASS) of greater than or equal to 2 after initial albuterol treatment
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Temperature in triage of greater than or equal to 39 degrees Celsius
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Medical history significant for cardiac, renal, or malignant disease, or bronchopulmonary dysplasia or cystic fibrosis
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients whose care is initiated in the trauma bay due to need for rapid stabilization
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Altered Mental Status (Glasgow Coma Score of < 15)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 15-year-old boy with asthma diagnosed a year ago. He presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough.
